name: Sylvan
author: MrBigTrace
notes: Pretty consistent throughout the climb. Played a lot of Amazon was decks on the ladder. Divine wrath helped a lot with princess and Econ helped against swordswoman. Carrotweight and guardioak are the mvpâ€™s this climb. Being able to send rose lover to the grave with carrot and bringing out guardioak to make plays opened up many OTKs.
